score_meta.label: Impersonal
score_meta.message: Your residents may feel like you're not attentive to their needs.

score_meta.label: Surface level
score_meta.message: You're covering the basics, not going above and beyond in creating a unique experience for residents.

score_meta.label: Extremely human
score_meta.message: You're setting your residents up for developing a personal connection to your properties. Way to go!

score_meta.label: Losing money
score_meta.message: Managers are likely spending too much time on daily operations. We recommend leveraging technology to better connect your residents.

score_meta.label: Inefficient
score_meta.message: You're trying to equip your staff with the right tools, but there may be some gaps in process or tooling.

score_meta.label: Extremely efficient
score_meta.message: You're a pro! You're providing a best in class toolset to your team efficent and productive.

score_meta.label: Disconnected
score_meta.message: Your community is disconnected. We recommend spending more time investing in community building activities to make your property feel more like home.

score_meta.label: Neighbors, not friends
score_meta.message: While your residents are likely able to engage with one another, there is still room for improvement. There are opportunities to host more on-site events and activities that bring residents closer together.

score_meta.label: Feels like home
score_meta.message: Your management is effectively leveraging technology and on-site activities to turn strangers into neighbors and neighbors into friends.
